title: Google I/O 2017 Extended IUT Announced
brief: Inha University in Tashkent and IUTLab are proud to announce the fifth annual Google I/O 2017 Extended IUT  which is one of the biggest Google related event in Tashkent carefully crafted by IUTLab, Texnoman and Uzgeeks this year! The event will take place on **May 20, 2017 **  in **Tashkent**.

title: Call for Speakers
brief: Google I/O 2017  Extended IUT  has been announced! The 3rd time of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Tashkent will take on **May 20** in  city of Tashkent.That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](http://bit.ly/lecen).
